amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $1 million in funding within the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect appropriations for the FBI by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 19 - 389, 16 Present (Roll no. 726).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
